text: Charles Edward "Charlie" Greene (March 21, 1945 – March 14, 2022) was an American track and field sprinter. He won the gold and bronze medal in the 4 × 100 metres relay at the 1968 Summer Olympics. Greene was born in Pine Bluff, Arkansas. Greene died on March 14, 2022 in Lincoln, Nebraska at the age of 76.Charlie Greene ==References== Category:1945 births Category:2022 deaths Category:African-American track and field athletes Category:American sprinters Category:Olympic bronze medalists for the United States Category:Olympic gold medalists for the United States Category:Sportspeople from Arkansas Category:Sportspeople from Nebraska Category:People from Pine Bluff, Arkansas Category:People from Lincoln, Nebraska Category:Disease-related deaths in Nebraska
title: Charles Greene (athlete)
